sen.j: 夏珪（かけい、生没年不明）は、南宋の画家。
sen.e: Kakei (year of birth and death unknown) is a painter in the era of Southern Sung cynasty.

sen.e: He is regarded as the leading painter of intaiga (a type of Chinese painting) at that time.

sen.j: 南宋の都であった杭州の画院で、寧宗 (宋)の時代に活躍をみせた。
sen.e: He was active at the gain (art institution) in Hangzhou, the capital of Southern Sung, during the era of Neiso (Sung).
He took an active role at the gain (art institution) in Hangzhou, the capital of Southern Sung, during the era of Neiso (Sung).

sen.j: とりわけ山水画が有名である。
sen.e: His works of sansui-ga (Chinese-style landscape painting) are famous in particular.

sen.j: 北宋期の風景画が大観的な視点から描いているのに対し、夏珪の画の多くは、画の一角に風景を描き多くを余白にした（「辺角の景」）。
sen.e: While landscape paintings in the era of Northern Sung are the ones that painted landscape from a broad viewpoint, Kakei's paintings are the ones that painted landscape only at the corner of canvas while leaving the big blank space (" Henkaku no Kei" (drawing method of landscape painting)).

While landscape paintings in the era of Northern Sung were the ones that painted landscape from a broad viewpoint, Kakei's paintings were the ones that painted landscape only at the corner of canvas and leaving the big blank space ("Henkaku no Kei" [drawing method of landscape painting]).
sen.cmt: are→were,while→and と修正しました。カッコ、スペースを修正しました。
sen.e: While landscape paintings in the era of Northern Sung were the ones that painted landscape from a broad viewpoint, Kakei's paintings were the ones that painted landscape only at the corner of canvas and leaving the big blank space ("Henkaku no Kei" [drawing method of landscape painting]).
